text: Hell in a Cell (2012) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by WWE. It took place on October 28, 2012 at the Philips Arena in Atlanta, Georgia. It was the fourth Hell in a Cell event held by WWE. ==Matches== ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Hell in a Cell website Category:World Wrestling Entertainment pay-per-view events Category:2010s in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:2012 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Atlanta
title: Hell in a Cell (2012)
